values.ctor:
<init>(type: MethodType!)
            Creates a blank call site object with the given method type.

<init>(target: MethodHandle!)
            Creates a call site object with an initial target method handle.

values.desc: Produces a method handle equivalent to an invokedynamic instruction which has been linked to this call site.
Returns the target method of the call site, which behaves like a normal field of the MutableCallSite.
Updates the target method of this call site, as a normal variable.
